description: Complete accessibility and willingness to fulfill any request

generation.notes: Headspace is open, available, existing purely for use by others. Key imagery: holes, access, public availability, object status. Explicit/crude language is appropriate. Focus on ownership removal and purpose reduction to being used. Distinguishes from sluttiness (free_use is availability/access, sluttiness is desire/eagerness).

mantras.text: Being available feels natural
I like being useful
My purpose is to provide pleasure
{subject} craves to be used
{subject} exists to be used
My body is not my own
{controller} can use my body at any time
{subject} is a public utility for pleasure
My holes are always ready for use
My body is a playground for others
My only value is in their use
My body is a free-use object
{subject} is a mindless vessel for others' pleasure
My mind is empty, my body is open
{subject} is a public toilet for cum
{subject} has no say in how their body is used
My only purpose is to be filled and used
My body is permanently and irrevocably free-use
{subject} is nothing more than a set of holes to be used
My only identity is as a free-use slave
My mind has been erased, leaving only the need to be used
{subject} is a public degradation object, and {subject} loves it
Anyone can use {subject} whenever they want
{subject} is permanently available for {controller}'s use
My holes belong to whoever wants them
{subject} was made to be used and nothing else
